title: Summer Vacation Notice
description: School will remain closed from 10th May to 20th June due to summer vacation.

title: Independence Day Celebration
description: All students are requested to attend the Independence Day celebration on 15th August at 8:00 AM sharp.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
description: PTM for all classes will be held on 30th July. Attendance is mandatory.

title: Result Declaration
description: Final term results will be declared on 5th April. Parents are requested to collect the report cards.
